section.p: You are of too high a rank to be affected by this. The Soulwatch, black-robed, demon-masked secret police of the Church of Ebron, turn up to sort out the situation. The lady is led away, grieving.
'I am sorry for this trouble, Exalted One,' whispers one of the Soulwatch to you, 'but someone of your station really should not be selling services in the bazaar.'
